parameters.name: ProvisionRegionId
parameters.description: The region ID of the new node.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description:
The region ID of the scenario.

You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~131035~~) operation to query the most recent region list.

parameters.name: TemplateScratchId
parameters.description:
The ID of the scenario.

For more information about how to query the IDs of scenarios, see [ListTemplateScratches](~~363050~~).

parameters.name: TemplateType
parameters.description: The type of the template that Resource Orchestration Service (ROS) generates. ROS can generate templates of the ROS and Terraform types. Default value: ROS.
